name: Job
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Instance
Job
description:
Job

A resource representing the long-running, asynchronous processing of an instance create or update operation. The job can be refreshed to retrieve the instance object once the operation has been completed.

See Project#create_instance and Instance#update.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/spanner"

spanner = Google::Cloud::Spanner.new

job = spanner.create_instance "my-new-instance",
                              name: "My New Instance",
                              config: "regional-us-central1",
                              nodes: 5,
                              labels: { production: :env }

job.done? #=> false
job.reload! # API call
job.done? #=> true
instance = job.instance

methods.name: instance
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Instance
Job#instance
methods.description: The instance that is the object of the operation.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/spanner"

spanner = Google::Cloud::Spanner.new

job = spanner.create_instance "my-new-instance",
                              name: "My New Instance",
                              config: "regional-us-central1",
                              nodes: 5,
                              labels: { production: :env }

job.done? #=> true
instance = job.instance

returns.description: The instance, or nil if the operation is not complete.

methods.name: done?
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Instance
Job#done?
methods.description: Checks if the processing of the instance operation is complete.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/spanner"

spanner = Google::Cloud::Spanner.new

job = spanner.create_instance "my-new-instance",
                              name: "My New Instance",
                              config: "regional-us-central1",
                              nodes: 5,
                              labels: { production: :env }

job.done? #=> false

methods.name: error?
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Instance
Job#error?
methods.description: Checks if the processing of the instance operation has errored.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/spanner"

spanner = Google::Cloud::Spanner.new

job = spanner.create_instance "my-new-instance",
                              name: "My New Instance",
                              config: "regional-us-central1",
                              nodes: 5,
                              labels: { production: :env }

job.error? #=> false

methods.name: reload!
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Instance
Job#reload!
methods.description: Reloads the job with current data from the long-running, asynchronous processing of an instance operation.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/spanner"

spanner = Google::Cloud::Spanner.new

job = spanner.create_instance "my-new-instance",
                              name: "My New Instance",
                              config: "regional-us-central1",
                              nodes: 5,
                              labels: { production: :env }

job.done? #=> false
job.reload! # API call
job.done? #=> true

methods.name: wait_until_done!
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Instance
Job#wait_until_done!
methods.description: Reloads the job until the operation is complete. The delay between reloads will incrementally increase.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/spanner"

spanner = Google::Cloud::Spanner.new

job = spanner.create_instance "my-new-instance",
                              name: "My New Instance",
                              config: "regional-us-central1",
                              nodes: 5,
                              labels: { production: :env }

job.done? #=> false
job.wait_until_done!
job.done? #=> true
